job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Software Engineer tl;dr: An innovative seed-stage startup in the DevSecOps space is looking for a Software Engineer (fullstack) to join our team and help design and build a greenfield cybersecurity product using bleeding edge technology. Our tech-stack and R&D culture  As this is a greenfield application, we do not have all the details ironed out, you will help us do that. However, we do know we will be using:  â Â  Â   Node.js backend  â Â  Â   React / Vue / Angular frontend  â Â  Â   TypeScript on both  â Â  Â   Serverless, kubernetes, AWS  â Â  Â   Neo4j, MongoDB  We will be putting a high emphasis on:  â Â  Â   Honing your skills  â Â  Â   SOLID design principles  â Â  Â   Highly maintainable and testable code  â Â  Â   Non-blocking automatic CI/CD pipeline  â Â  Â   Letting developers develop and not distract them with endless unneeded meetings, procedures and rules  â Â  Â   Involvement and impact on the decision making process and roadmap of a new product  â Â  Â   Open-source use and contribute  What do we expect you to bring to the table? We believe that for every highly functioning relationship, there must be a good synergy between the partners and that it must be a win-win situation for all.  Our key requirements are:  â Â  Â   Enjoy your work and working with your team and be proud of it  â Â  Â   Assume best intentions â we know we will!  â Â  Â   Drive to build something amazing  â Â  Â   Be excited about data and coding  â Â  Â   Have strong opinions, but hold them loosely  Â  What will you be doing? As a seed-stage team member, you will be working on a greenfield application and ML models. You will be an integral part of the design and architecture decision process, working directly with the other team members and leadership (we have a very flat structure). In this role you will have a huge impact on the success of the company.
